attributes.action: stop the takeover of Cadbury by Kraft on the grounds that Kraft have had to secure a loan from RBS in order to make the purchase.  We, the taxpayers own most of RBS and I do not agree that this bank should be giving a loan to a poorly performing foreign company to purchase a better British company.
